ee sandaha wiwidha samaja thalawala sita kriyathmaka wiwidha wadasatahan yatathe gama pelagasimath, adu aadayamlabhi pawul sanwidhanagatha karamin kriyathmaka wana janatha wyaparayak bawata path wi atha.nidahas aarthika prathipaththiya kriyathmaka wimath samanga karmika ratawala goda gasi athi maha dhanaskandayath, desha sima mayim ikmawa wardhanayawimath samangama minisa jayagrahanaya menma parajayanda bhukthi windimin sahashraye minisa muhuna dena duppathkama namathi abhiyogaya jaya ganima samruddhi wyaparaya wata eekarashi wi athi bawin ee sandaha wiwidha sanwardhana prawesha haraha katayuthu kereyi.samruddhi prathilabhin sandaha wu sahanadhara wadasatahan lesa samruddhi wyapruthiya aarthakathanaya kala da eya eeta wada pulul wa wihidunu pahala mattame sita jathika thalaya dakwa wihidi giya dipa wyaptha wadasatahan wana athara minisage upathe sita maranaya dakwa wu jiwitha kalaya thuladi minisa muhuna dena duk kamkatolu hamuwe duppath prajawa sandaha nosali sitina ekama aarakshakaya wi atha.subasadhaka praweshaya man samruddhi prathilabhin sandaha pahatha sandahan prathilaba walata himikam labadi atha.masikawa labadena mudal sahanadharaya, poshana dimanawa, aniwarya ithiri kirim.
